verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> Hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> ye this word הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I נֹשֵׂ֧א <WH5375> which I take up עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> you קִינָ֖ה <WH7015> against you [even] a lamentation בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

נָֽפְלָה֙ <WH5307> is fallen לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תוֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> she shall no more ק֔וּם <WH6965> rise בְּתוּלַ֖ת <WH1330> The virgin יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel נִטְּשָׁ֥ה <WH5203> she is forsaken עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְמָתָ֖הּ <WH127> upon her land אֵ֥ין <WH369> There מְקִימָֽהּ׃ <WH6965> [there is] none to raise her up

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הָעִ֛יר <WH5892> The city הַיֹּצֵ֥את <WH3318> that went out אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> [by] a thousand תַּשְׁאִ֣יר <WH7604> shall leave מֵאָ֑ה <WH3967> an hundred וְהַיּוֹצֵ֥את <WH3318> and that which went forth מֵאָ֛ה <WH3967> [by] an hundred תַּשְׁאִ֥יר <WH7604> shall leave עֲשָׂרָ֖ה <WH6235> ten לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel דִּרְשׁ֖וּנִי <WH1875> Seek וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <WH2421> ye me and ye shall live

וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּדְרְשׁוּ֙ <WH1875> But seek בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> not Bethel וְהַגִּלְגָּל֙ <WH1537> into Gilgal לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תָבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> nor enter וּבְאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֖בַע <WH884> not to Beersheba לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <WH5674> and pass כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הַגִּלְגָּל֙ <WH1537> for Gilgal גָּלֹ֣ה <WH1540> shall surely יִגְלֶ֔ה <WH1540> go into captivity וּבֵֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> and Bethel יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will come לְאָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> shall come to nought

דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1875> Seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וִֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> and ye shall live פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or יִצְלַ֤ח <WH6743> lest he break out כָּאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> like fire בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph וְאָכְלָ֥ה <WH398> and devour וְאֵין־ <WH369> none מְכַבֶּ֖ה <WH3518> [it] and [there be] none to quench לְבֵֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> [it] in Bethel
הַהֹפְכִ֥ים <WH2015> Ye who turn לְלַעֲנָ֖ה <WH3939> to wormwood מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> righteousness לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the earth הִנִּֽיחוּ׃ <WH3240> and leave off

עֹשֵׂ֨ה <WH6213> [Seek him] that maketh כִימָ֜ה <WH3598> the seven stars וּכְסִ֗יל <WH3685> and Orion וְהֹפֵ֤ךְ <WH2015> and turneth לַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> into the morning צַלְמָ֔וֶת <WH6757> the shadow of death וְי֖וֹם <WH3117> and maketh the day לַ֣יְלָה <WH3915> with night הֶחְשִׁ֑יךְ <WH2821> dark הַקּוֹרֵ֣א <WH7121> that calleth לְמֵֽי־ <WH4325> for the waters הַיָּ֗ם <WH3220> of the sea וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכֵ֛ם <WH8210> and poureth them out עַל־ <WH5921> upon פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> [is] his name ס

הַמַּבְלִ֥יג <WH1082> That strengtheneth שֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> the spoiled עַל־ <WH5921> upon עָ֑ז <WH5794> against the strong וְשֹׁ֖ד <WH7701> so that the spoiled עַל־ <WH5921> upon מִבְצָ֥ר <WH4013> against the fortress יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> shall come
שָׂנְא֥וּ <WH8130> They hate בַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> in the gate מוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> him that rebuketh וְדֹבֵ֥ר <WH1696> him that speaketh תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> uprightly יְתָעֵֽבוּ׃ <WH8581> and they abhor

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> Therefore יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Forasmuch בּוֹשַׁסְכֶ֞ם <WH1318> therefore as your treading עַל־ <WH5921> on דָּ֗ל <WH1800> [is] upon the poor וּמַשְׂאַת־ <WH4864> from him burdens בַּר֙ <WH1250> of wheat תִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> and ye take מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at בָּתֵּ֥י <WH1004> houses גָזִ֛ית <WH1496> of hewn stone בְּנִיתֶ֖ם <WH1129> ye have built וְלֹא־ <WH3808> you will not תֵ֣שְׁבוּ <WH3427> but ye shall not dwell בָ֑ם כַּרְמֵי־ <WH3754> vineyards חֶ֣מֶד <WH2531> pleasant נְטַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH5193> in them ye have planted וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁתּ֖וּ <WH8354> but ye shall not drink אֶת־ <WH853> יֵינָֽם׃ <WH3196> wine

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> For I know רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> your manifold פִּשְׁעֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6588> transgressions וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <WH6099> and your mighty חַטֹּֽאתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH2403> sins צֹרְרֵ֤י <WH6887> they afflict צַדִּיק֙ <WH6662> the just לֹ֣קְחֵי <WH3947> they take כֹ֔פֶר <WH3724> a bribe וְאֶבְיוֹנִ֖ים <WH34> the poor בַּשַּׁ֥עַר <WH8179> in the gate הִטּֽוּ׃ <WH5186> and they turn aside

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore הַמַּשְׂכִּ֛יל <WH7919> Therefore the prudent בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> in that time הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> such יִדֹּ֑ם <WH1826> shall keep silence כִּ֛י <WH3588> for עֵ֥ת <WH6256> time רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> for it [is] an evil הִֽיא׃ <WH1931> such

דִּרְשׁוּ־ <WH1875> Seek ט֥וֹב <WH2896> good וְאַל־ <WH408> and not רָ֖ע <WH7451> and not evil לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תִּֽחְי֑וּ <WH2421> that ye may live וִיהִי־ <WH1961> become כֵ֞ן <WH3651> and thus יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> and so the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> the God צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you אֲמַרְתֶּֽם׃ <WH559> shall be with you as ye have spoken

שִׂנְאוּ־ <WH8130> Hate רָע֙ <WH7451> the evil וְאֶ֣הֱבוּ <WH157> and love ט֔וֹב <WH2896> the good וְהַצִּ֥יגוּ <WH3322> and establish בַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> in the gate מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> judgment אוּלַ֗י <WH194> Perhaps יֶֽחֱנַ֛ן <WH2603> will be gracious יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> it may be that the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> unto the remnant יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> of Joseph ס

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> the God צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> the Lord בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all רְחֹב֣וֹת <WH7339> [shall be] in all streets מִסְפֵּ֔ד <WH4553> thus Wailing וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all חוּצ֖וֹת <WH2351> in all the highways יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and they shall say הוֹ־ <WH1930> Alas ה֑וֹ <WH1930> alas וְקָרְא֤וּ <WH7121> and they shall call אִכָּר֙ <WH406> the husbandman אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֔בֶל <WH60> to mourning וּמִסְפֵּ֖ד <WH4553> to wailing אֶל־ <WH413> and to י֥וֹדְעֵי <WH3045> and such as are skilful נֶֽהִי׃ <WH5092> of lamentation

וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all כְּרָמִ֖ים <WH3754> And in all vineyards מִסְפֵּ֑ד <WH4553> [shall be] wailing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אֶעֱבֹ֥ר <WH5674> for I will pass בְּקִרְבְּךָ֖ <WH7130> through אָמַ֥ר <WH559> thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

ה֥וֹי <WH1945> Woe הַמִּתְאַוִּ֖ים <WH183> unto you that desire אֶת־ <WH853> י֣וֹם <WH3117> the day יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָמָּה־ <WH4100> to what end זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> purpose לָכֶ֛ם י֥וֹם <WH3117> [is] it for you? the day יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הוּא־ <WH1931> you חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> [is] darkness וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> and not light

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָנ֥וּס <WH5127> did flee אִישׁ֙ <WH376> As if a man מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from הָאֲרִ֔י <WH738> a lion וּפְגָע֖וֹ <WH6293> met הַדֹּ֑ב <WH1677> and a bear וּבָ֣א <WH935> him or went הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> into the house וְסָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> and leaned יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> against הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> on the wall וּנְשָׁכ֖וֹ <WH5391> bit הַנָּחָֽשׁ׃ <WH5175> and a serpent

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> instead חֹ֛שֶׁךְ <WH2822> [be] darkness י֥וֹם <WH3117> [Shall] not the day יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no א֑וֹר <WH216> of light וְאָפֵ֖ל <WH651> gloom וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no נֹ֥גַֽהּ <WH5051> and no brightness לֽוֹ׃

שָׂנֵ֥אתִי <WH8130> I hate מָאַ֖סְתִּי <WH3988> I despise חַגֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH2282> your feast days וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor אָרִ֖יחַ <WH7306> and I will not smell בְּעַצְּרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6116> in your solemn assemblies

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Even אִם־ <WH518> though תַּעֲלוּ־ <WH5927> Though ye offer לִ֥י עֹל֛וֹת <WH5930> me burnt offerings וּמִנְחֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4503> and your meat offerings לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶרְצֶ֑ה <WH7521> I will not accept וְשֶׁ֥לֶם <WH8002> the peace offerings מְרִיאֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4806> of your fat beasts לֹ֥א <WH3808> and I אַבִּֽיט׃ <WH5027> [them] neither will I regard

הָסֵ֥ר <WH5493> Take thou away מֵעָלַ֖י <WH5921> and הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> from me the noise שִׁרֶ֑יךָ <WH7892> of thy songs וְזִמְרַ֥ת <WH2172> the melody נְבָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5035> of thy viols לֹ֥א <WH3808> even אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> for I will not hear
וְיִגַּ֥ל <WH1556> run down כַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> as waters מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> But let judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and righteousness כְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> stream אֵיתָֽן׃ <WH386> as a mighty

הַזְּבָחִ֨ים <WH2077> unto me sacrifices וּמִנְחָ֜ה <WH4503> and offerings הִֽגַּשְׁתֶּם־ <WH5066> Have ye offered לִ֧י בַמִּדְבָּ֛ר <WH4057> in the wilderness אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וּנְשָׂאתֶ֗ם <WH5375> But ye have borne אֵ֚ת <WH853> סִכּ֣וּת <WH5522> the tabernacle מַלְכְּכֶ֔ם <WH4432> Molech וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כִּיּ֣וּן <WH3594> and Chiun צַלְמֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6754> your images כּוֹכַב֙ <WH3556> the star אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> of your god אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> which ye made לָכֶֽם׃

וְהִגְלֵיתִ֥י <WH1540> Therefore will I cause you to go into captivity אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מֵהָ֣לְאָה <WH1973> beyond לְדַמָּ֑שֶׂק <WH1834> Damascus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> [is] The God צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> whose name פ
